articles.title: Australia's chief vaccine safety body backs AstraZeneca jab for patients with history of blood clots - 9News

articles.description: Three-year-old Ashlyn Romana was one of more than 170 Australian children stuck in India without their parents. But she's now made it home thanks to a stranger her mother reached out to on social media.
